pages.text: Named after Ruby, the first smith who made the Blade. I recorded the universal recipe of its recent replica.$(br2)Its replica used to be owned by almost everyone, which is a beautiful memory of that period. For many reasons, there are fewer and fewer persons who own the Ruby Blade.
If you cannot see the recipe, you may not have Sakura Mod and SJAP Mod installed. But you may use BladeSoul to get the Blade instead.
